title: Where to watch the College championship vods?
body:
Not sure where to watch these. I've gone to the Lolesports website and nothing. Nothing on the Lolesports YouTube channel. I can't find any vods on twitch. 

It's almost like Riot doesn't care about the college championship. Why make it so hard to watch these?

replies.body:
Hey Paquay!  You can find the vods on the uLoL Youtube channel.  Here's a link directly to the videos section of the channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8RToqB1bw_aaon_70bdDqg/videos

The vods aren't on lolesports.com because it's not part of the normal esports broadcast or run by the esports department - it's part of the collegiate program, which is separate!
Awesome! Thanks a ton for the info.
